product_name: Chaos Crushable Straw Hat - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: With a wide brim to shield you from the sun, the Chaos Crushable Straw Hat combines coverage with comfort thanks to soft, flexible materials. Straw/polyester fabric is soft and packs down small for easy transport. Internal headband improves fit and keeps sweat out of your eyes. Chaos Crushable Straw Hat has a 4 in. brim. Closeout.
short_description: With a wide brim to shield you from the sun, the Chaos Crushable Straw Hat combines coverage with comfort thanks to soft, flexible materials.
